title: MD
biography: The OTI Festival 1997 was the 26th edition of the OTI Festival. It consisted of a semi-final on 24 October and a final on 25 October 1997, held at Plaza Mayor in Lima, Peru, and presented by Jorge Beleván and Claudia Doig. It was organised by the Organización de Televisión Iberoamericana (OTI) and host broadcaster Compañía Peruana de Radiodifusión (CPR).
aiSummary: Alejandro Afani is a infectious disease specialist with an H-index of 7 at University of Chile (Member). Has been published in The Lancet HIV. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
